channel.title: How to make ladder work at hill giants cave?
channel.description: I wanna make monsters be down there so people on my server can train down there. But when i get to the ladder it wont let me go down? Anyway on how to fix? Details please! :)) thnx

item.title: How to make ladder work at hill giants cave?
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

Then I’d guess it’s in your client class file, I think… packet 132? Your code should look similar to this…

if (objectID == LADDERIDHERE) {
     heightLevel = -1;
}

Read full topic
item.source: How to make ladder work at hill giants cave?

item.title: How to make ladder work at hill giants cave?
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

Object first click packet, I think. You’d just have it to where the ID of the door is called, and have it reduce your height level by 1.

Read full topic
